initial-thank-you-email-to-customer.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

Thank you for taking the time to report flytipping. We will take a look at your report and let you know what we do next. 

Your reference for this case is {{ case.reference }}

If you'd like to attach more photos or add more information you can log in and comment on your case online

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
initial-thank-you-email-to-customer.subject: Thank you for reporting flytipping
initial-thank-you-email-to-customer.title: Initial thank you email to customer

let-the-customer-know-that-its-kcc.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

Thank you again for reporting flytipping to us. Unfortunately, we are unable to take action in this case because it has been left on private land.

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
let-the-customer-know-that-its-kcc.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
let-the-customer-know-that-its-kcc.title: Non collection private land

let-customer-know-that-were-going-to-pic.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Thank you again for taking the time to report flytipping to us. We have looked into this case and have arranged for a team to collect the waste.

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
let-customer-know-that-were-going-to-pic.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
let-customer-know-that-were-going-to-pic.title: Let customer know that we're going to pick it up

let-customer-know-its-complete.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

We've now picked up the flytipping you reported to us.

Reference: {{ case.reference }}

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
let-customer-know-its-complete.subject: We've picked up the flytipping you reported
let-customer-know-its-complete.title: Let customer know it's complete

non-collection-kcc.html_body:
Hi {{ case.values['first_name'].value }} {{ case.values['last_name'].value }},

Thank you again for reporting flytipping to us. As the waste is on a highway we are unable to deal with the problem.

Please report it on the Kent County Council website

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
non-collection-kcc.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
non-collection-kcc.title: Non collection KCC

flytipping-case-needs-action.html_body:
Hi,

The flytipping case {{ case.reference }} was raised 48 hours ago and has not been updated. Please take action on this as soon as possible.

View the case online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
flytipping-case-needs-action.subject: Flytipping case {{ case.reference }} needs to be updated
flytipping-case-needs-action.title: Flytipping case needs action

email-third-party-about-customer-comment.html_body:
Hi,

The flytipping case {{ case.reference }} has been commented on by the customer. Please take a look and reply if necessary.

View the case online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
email-third-party-about-customer-comment.subject: Comment left by customer on {{ case.reference }}
email-third-party-about-customer-comment.title: Email third party about customer comment

email-customer-if-message-reply-sent.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

A message about your flytipping report has been left for you.

To read the message please log in and view your case online.

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
email-customer-if-message-reply-sent.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
email-customer-if-message-reply-sent.title: Email customer if message reply sent

email-serco-to-say-its-urgent.html_body:
Hi,

A flytipping case ({{ case.reference }}) has been reported as having dangerous waste:

View the case online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
email-serco-to-say-its-urgent.subject: Important: {{ case.reference }} includes hazardous waste
email-serco-to-say-its-urgent.title: Email Serco to say it's urgent

contracts-you-need-to-take-action.html_body:
Hi,

The flytipping case {{ case.reference }} is waiting for review from Contracts. Please take action on this as soon as possible.

View the case online
contracts-you-need-to-take-action.subject: You need to update flytipping case {{ case.reference }}
contracts-you-need-to-take-action.title: Contracts: you need to take action

non-collection-highways.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

Thank you again for reporting flytipping to us. As the waste is on a major road we are unable to deal with the problem.

Please contact Highways England to report the problem.

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
non-collection-highways.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
non-collection-highways.title: Non collection Highways

hazardous-waste-left-more-than-two-hours.html_body:
Hi,

A flytipping case ({{ case.reference }}) with dangerous waste has not been marked as complete within two hours.

View the case online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
hazardous-waste-left-more-than-two-hours.subject: Important: {{ case.reference }} over 2 hour hazardous waste SLA
hazardous-waste-left-more-than-two-hours.title: Hazardous waste left more than two hours

request-input-from-customer.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

Are you able to provide more detail on your flytipping report?

{{ case.values.information_needed_from_customer.value }}

If you can help please log in and comment on your case online

Thanks,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
request-input-from-customer.subject: We'd like more detail on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
request-input-from-customer.title: Request input from customer

customer-has-responded-to-request-for-mo.html_body:
Hi,

The customer has added more detail to the flytipping case {{ case.reference }}as requested

 View the case online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
customer-has-responded-to-request-for-mo.subject: Customer has responded to request for more detail on {{ case.reference }}
customer-has-responded-to-request-for-mo.title: Customer has responded to request for more detail

close-the-case-due-to-lack-of-informatio.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

We have closed the flytipping report you made on {{ case.createdAt|date('m-d-Y, H:i:s') }} because we did not have enough information to take appropriate action.

If you are able to give this information please report the flytipping again on our website

Thanks again,

Serco - on behalf of Canterbury City Council
close-the-case-due-to-lack-of-informatio.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
close-the-case-due-to-lack-of-informatio.title: Close the case due to lack of information

non-collection-enforcement-only.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

Thank you again for reporting flytipping to us (ref: {{ case.reference }})

We are unable to pick up this waste. However, we are seeking to use evidence found at the scene to take enforcement action against the culprit.

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
non-collection-enforcement-only.subject: An update on your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
non-collection-enforcement-only.title: Non collection enforcement only

notify-enforcement-of-a-relevant-case.html_body:
Hi,

A new flytipping case has been assigned for Enforcement action.

Review the case online

Thanks
notify-enforcement-of-a-relevant-case.subject: A new flytipping case has been assigned to you {{ case.reference }}
notify-enforcement-of-a-relevant-case.title: Notify Enforcement of a relevant case

e18-email-customer-to-say-enforcement-in.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }},

This email is just to let you know that our Enforcement team is investigating your flytipping report.

We will look to fine or prosecute the offender if we find evidence.

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e18-email-customer-to-say-enforcement-in.subject: We are investigating your flytipping report {{ case.reference }}
e18-email-customer-to-say-enforcement-in.title: E18 Email customer to say enforcement in progress

rules.name: Let customer know we're picking up
Email initial thank you to customer
Send non collection private land email
Send KCC report email
Email saying we've picked it up
R6 Case completion SLA
Mark case as urgent
Comment left by customer
Email customer if message reply sent
Assign Serco to a new case
R1 Assign Enforcement to a new case

Email Contracts for action needed
Send Highways report email
Put case under review if customer comments when closed
Request input from customer
Customer provides detail as requested

R9 Send non collection enforcement only email
R21 Email customer about Enforcement in progress
